attributes.action: please stop the unwanted deregulation of the blackcab trade in stockport
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: the licencing committee in stockport want to delimit the number of blackcab licences it permits from its current 120. the drivers believe that the current numbers are more than ample and an unmet demand survey commissioned by the council totally backs up there claims the survey cost £23000 and the licencing committee are ignoring a survey that they commissioned and paid for
